articles.content: A study presented at the Anesthesiology 2022 annual meeting found that those who use cannabis experience higher pain after surgery than those who don't. "Cannabis is the most commonly used illicit dr… [+2123 chars]

articles.description: 'Any oxygen fraction between 30% and 80% is fine,' presenter says
